Yonkers.Philipse Manor Hall State Historic Site: Philipse Manor Hall State Historic Site is a historic house museum located in the Getty Square neighborhood of Yonkers, New York. Originally the family seat of Philipse Manor, it is Westchester County’s oldest standing building. It is located at Warburton Avenue and Dock Street, and is currently owned and operated by the New York State Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation.
